deleteMetadata

public static void deleteMetadata(oracle.mds.core.MDSSession sess,
                                  java.lang.String moName)
Delete the metadata for the current user for the metadata object moName.

Parameters:
sess - current MDS session.
moName - metadata name to clean out.

findOrCreateMutableMetadataObject

public static oracle.mds.core.MetadataObject findOrCreateMutableMetadataObject(oracle.mds.core.MDSSession mdsSession,
                                                                               java.lang.String moName)
Find or Create the Mutable MetadataObject for moName. If no base document exists it will be created.

Parameters:
mdsSession - current MDS session.
moName - metadata name to clean out.
Returns:
MetadataObject for changing.

getDocument

public static org.w3c.dom.Document getDocument(oracle.mds.core.MDSSession sess,
                                               java.lang.String moName)
Get the DOM Document for moName. If no base document exists it will be created.

Parameters:
sess - current MDS Session.
moName - metadata object name.
Returns:
Document with merged valuse for the current user.

getMutableDocument

public static org.w3c.dom.Document getMutableDocument(oracle.mds.core.MDSSession sess,
                                                      java.lang.String moName)
Get the DOM Document for moName ready for mutation. If no base document exists it will be created.

Parameters:
sess - current MDS Session.
moName - metadata object name.
Returns:
Document with merged valuse for the current user.

findOrCreateMetadataObject

public static oracle.mds.core.MetadataObject findOrCreateMetadataObject(oracle.mds.core.MDSSession mdsSession,
                                                                        java.lang.String moName)
Find or Create the MetadataObject for moName. If no base document exists it will be created.

Parameters:
mdsSession - current user MDS session.
moName - name of metadata object.
Returns:
MetadataObject for moName.

Save the current changes in sess.

Parameters:
sess - Current user MDS session.
